benchmark_details.name: WFMALL Dataset for Definition Extraction
benchmark_details.overview: The paper presents a new annotated dataset of mathematical definitions, called WFMALL, for the task of automatic definition extraction from mathematical texts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset for training supervised models aimed at the extraction of mathematical definitions.

data.source: The dataset was created by collecting and processing articles from Wolfram MathWorld.
data.annotation: Sentences were manually labeled by annotators with at least BSc degrees in mathematics.

methods: Deep Learning with CNN and LSTM
methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated based on evaluation results of models on defined data splits.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy and F1 scores indicate better performance in identifying definitions.
methodology.baseline_results: DefMiner and traditional models (SVM, Random Forest, etc.) were used as baselines.
